short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,es_4: Dark theme for every website. Care your eyes, use Dark Reader for night and daily browsing.
short.cs: Tmavý motiv pro každou stránku. Používejte Dark Reader pro celodenní prohlížení webu a šetřete tak své oči.
short.de: Dunkles Design für jede Website. Schonen Sie Ihre Augen und verwenden Sie Dark Reader für die Nacht und das tägliche Surfen.
short.en_US: Provides tools for people who are visually impaired. Forked from extension Dark Reader.
short.es: Tema oscuro para todos los sitios. Cuide sus ojos, utilice Dark Reader para navegar durante el día y la noche.
short.fr: Thème sombre pour chaque site Web. Prenez soin de vos yeux, utilisez Dark Reader pour votre navigation nocturne et quotidienne.
short.hi: हर वेबसाइट के लिए डार्क थीम। अपनी आंखों की देखभाल करें, रात और दैनिक ब्राउज़िंग के लिए डार्क रीडर का उपयोग करें।
short.id: Mode Malam untuk semua website. Jaga kesehatan mata and dengan menggunakan Dark Reader untuk aktivitas anda berselancar di dunia…
short.it: Tema scuro per ogni sito. Prenditi cura dei tuoi occhi, usa Dark Reader per navigare giorno e notte.
short.ja: すべてのウェブサイトにダークテーマを適用します。夜間や毎日のブラウジングにDark Readerを使用し、あなたの目を気遣います。
short.ko: 모든 웹 사이트의 검은 색 테마. 눈을 보호하고 야간 및 주간 탐색을 위해 Dark Reader 을 사용하십시오.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Tema escuro para todos os sites. Cuide dos seus olhos, use o Dark Reader para navegação noturna e diária.
short.ro: Temă întunecată pentru orice site. Ai grijă de ochii tăi, folosește Dark Reader pentru cititul noaptea și de zi cu zi.
short.ru: Тёмная тема для каждого сайта. Берегите зрение, используйте Дарк Ридер для ночного или ежедневного просмотра веб-страниц.
short.zh_CN: 黑色主题，适用于任何网站。关爱眼睛，就使用Dark Reader进行夜间和日间浏览。
short.zh_TW: 黑色主題，適用於任何網站。關愛眼睛，就使用Dark Reader進行夜間和日間瀏覽。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,es_419,et,:
Illumify visualization tool enables night mode creating dark themes and themes featuring color blind correction. Illumify inverts bright colors giving them more contrast and making them easier to see.

You can adjust brightness, contrast, sepia filter, dark mode, font settings, text size, as well as change various color blind options. 

Color blind options include: changing link colors for visited and uninvited sites, having color values display via text popup when hovering the mouse over the web page, and a color blind correction filter that adjusts based on the type of color blindness and the sensitivity of an individual. While these features are all working, they are still under development and may behave strangely. 

Illumify is a fork of Dark Reader. It does not show ads and does not send user's data anywhere. It will be fully open-source in the near future.
https://github.com/darkreader/darkreader
https://github.com/agatt1/Illumify
App feedback can be given here: https://marquette.az1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_9ZaufkfIR6luDSR

Illumify is a fork of Dark Reader. It does not show ads and does not send user's data anywhere. It will be fully open-source in the near future.
